Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at UIC/Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at UIC/Halsted. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Kedzie
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Kedzie due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Kedzie due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
